verses.verse: And <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>: My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5970>exulteth<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; My <S%H7161>horn<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> over mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; Because I <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
There is none <S%H6918>holy<s%> as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For there is none <S%H1115>besides<s%> <S%H6697>thee<s%>, Neither is there any rock like our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Talk <S%H1696><s%> no <S%H7235>more<s%> so <S%H1364>exceeding<s%> <S%H1364>proudly<s%>; Let not <S%H6277>arrogancy<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1844>knowledge<s%>, And by him <S%H5949>actions<s%> are <S%H8505>weighed<s%>.
The <S%H7198>bows<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> are <S%H2844>broken<s%>; And they that <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> are <S%H247>girded<s%> with <S%H2428>strength<s%>.

They that were <S%H7649>full<s%> have hired <S%H7936>out<s%> themselves for <S%H3899>bread<s%>; And they that were <S%H7457>hungry<s%> have <S%H2308>ceased<s%> to <S%H6135>hunger<s%>: Yea, the barren hath <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%>; And she that hath <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H4191>killeth<s%>, and maketh <S%H2421>alive<s%>: He bringeth <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, and bringeth <S%H5927>up<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> maketh <S%H3423>poor<s%>, and maketh <S%H6238>rich<s%>: He bringeth <S%H8213>low<s%>, he <S%H637>also<s%> lifteth <S%H7311>up<s%>.

He raiseth <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, He lifteth <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> from the <S%H830>dunghill<s%>, To make them <S%H3427>sit<s%> with <S%H5081>princes<s%>, And <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%>: For the <S%H4690>pillars<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s, And he hath <S%H7896>set<s%> the world upon <S%H8398>them<s%>.

He will <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of his holy <S%H2623>ones<s%>; But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put to <S%H1826>silence<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; For by <S%H3581>strength<s%> shall no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1396>prevail<s%>.

They that <S%H7378>strive<s%> with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be broken to <S%H2865>pieces<s%>; Against them will he <S%H7481>thunder<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; And he will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto his <S%H4428>king<s%>, And <S%H7311>exalt<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.

And <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>. And the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H1961>did<s%> <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5941>Eli<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.
Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%> were <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%>; they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H4941>custom<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H376>was<s%>, that, when any man <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, while the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> was <S%H1310>boiling<s%>, with a <S%H4207>flesh-hook<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8127>teeth<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> it into the <S%H3595>pan<s%>, or <S%H1731>kettle<s%>, or <S%H7037>caldron<s%>, or <S%H6517>pot<s%>; all that the <S%H4207>flesh-hook<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6213>therewith<s%>. So they did in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> unto all the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> that came <S%H935>thither<s%>.

Yea <S%H6999><s%>, before they burnt the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H6740>roast<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest<s%>; for he will not <S%H3947>have<s%> <S%H1310>boiled<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H2416>thee<s%>, but raw.

And if the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6999>him<s%>, They will surely <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H3117>first<s%>, and then <S%H3947>take<s%> as much as thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desireth<s%>; then he would <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H5414>Nay<s%>, but thou shalt give it me <S%H3947>now<s%>: and if not, I will take it by <S%H2394>force<s%>.

And the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of the young <S%H5288>men<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5006>despised<s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
But <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8334>ministered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, being a <S%H5288>child<s%>, <S%H2296>girded<s%> with a <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

Moreover his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H4598>robe<s%>, and <S%H5927>brought<s%> it to him from <S%H3117>year<s%> to <S%H3117>year<s%>, when she came <S%H5927>up<s%> with her <S%H376>husband<s%> to <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H3117>yearly<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.

And <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7760>give<s%> thee <S%H2233>seed<s%> of this <S%H802>woman<s%> for the <S%H7596>petition<s%> which was <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And they <S%H1980>went<s%> unto their own <S%H4725>home<s%>.

And <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H2584>Hannah<s%>, and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>. And the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%> <S%H5973>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Now <S%H5941>Eli<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2204>old<s%>; and he <S%H8085>heard<s%> all that his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and how that they <S%H7901>lay<s%> with the <S%H802>women<s%> that did <S%H6633>service<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>them<s%>, Why do ye such <S%H1697>things<s%>? for I <S%H8085>hear<s%> of your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>dealings<s%> from all this <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Nay <S%H1121><s%>, my sons; for it is no <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8052>report<s%> that I <S%H8085>hear<s%>: ye make <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5674>transgress<s%>.

If one <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H376>another<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6419>judge<s%> <S%H376>him<s%>; but if a man <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who shall <S%H6419>entreat<s%> for <S%H8085>him<s%>? Notwithstanding, they hearkened not unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>, because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2654>minded<s%> to slay <S%H4191>them<s%>.
And the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1432>grew<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%>, and increased in <S%H2896>favor<s%> both with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and also with <S%H582>men<s%>.

And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> unto <S%H5941>Eli<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Did I <S%H1540>reveal<s%> <S%H1540>myself<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, when they were in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in bondage to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>?

and did I <S%H977>choose<s%> him out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to be my <S%H3548>priest<s%>, to <S%H5927>go<s%> up unto mine <S%H4196>altar<s%>, to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>, to <S%H5375>wear<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5414>me<s%>? and did I give unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%> all the offerings of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>?

Wherefore <S%H1163>kick<s%> ye at my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and at mine <S%H4503>offering<s%>, which I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> in my <S%H4583>habitation<s%>, and <S%H3513>honorest<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> above <S%H1254>me<s%>, to make yourselves fat with the <S%H7225>chiefest<s%> of all the <S%H4503>offerings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>?

Therefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%>, I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H559>indeed<s%> that thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, should <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>: but now <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%>, Be it far from <S%H2486>me<s%>; for them that <S%H3513>honor<s%> me I will <S%H3513>honor<s%>, and they that <S%H959>despise<s%> me shall be lightly <S%H7043>esteemed<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, that I will cut <S%H1438>off<s%> thine <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, that there shall not be an old <S%H2205>man<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5027>behold<s%> the <S%H6862>affliction<s%> of my <S%H4583>habitation<s%>, in all the wealth which God shall <S%H3190>give<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and there shall not be an old <S%H2205>man<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3772>thine<s%>, whom I shall not cut off from mine <S%H4196>altar<s%>, shall be to <S%H3615>consume<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and to <S%H109>grieve<s%> thy <S%H5315>heart<s%>; and all the <S%H4768>increase<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in the flower of their <S%H582>age<s%>.

And this shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> unto <S%H935>thee<s%>, that shall come upon thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, on <S%H2652>Hophni<s%> and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>: in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> both of <S%H8147>them<s%>.

And I will raise me <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to that which is in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and in my <S%H5315>mind<s%>: and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; and he shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> mine <S%H4899>anointed<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3498>pass<s%>, that every one that is left in thy <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to him for a <S%H95>piece<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H5596>Put<s%> <S%H259>me<s%>, I pray thee, into one of the <S%H3550>priests<s%>' offices, that I may <S%H398>eat<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
